name: Escape the House 1
description:
A very simple command line game that is played in the command window. Its only compatible with 64 bit versions of windows and I don't know how to fix that. The Escape the house series will get more complex as I learn more C++ coding. Honestly I'm using the itchio account as a portfolio of me learning C++.

Please do not underestimate how simple this game is. Having the manual open while playing will be useful.

This game functions more like a test of the basic mechanics, and any story elements are hidden. The sequels will build on this in both story and mechanics.

I don't know if it will work on non-windows systems. I doubt it.
